title: Invasive species cost the global economy over $423 billion annually, according to a new report from the United Nations
description: The costs of invasive species have quadrupled every decade since 1970, according to the UN.

title: 'Barbie' wins the summer box office, but fall looks gloomy — even with Taylor Swift
description: Hollywood bet big on blockbuster franchise sequels to revive its summer cinema business, but "Barbie" and "Oppenheimer" fueled the industry's $4 billion haul.

title: Texas paid bitcoin miner Riot $31.7 million to shut down during heat wave in August
description: Bitcoin miner Riot Platforms raked in $31.7 million in energy credits from Texas power grid operator ERCOT in August.

title: Ukraine drone supplier AeroVironment soars more than 20%, heads for best day in more than 2 years
description: Drone manufacturer AeroVironment's shares rallied more than 25% on Wednesday on the back of better-than-expected fiscal first-quarter results.

title: This former Harvard lecturer sold his company for nearly $20 million—and burnt out immediately after: Here's how he recovered
description: Suneel Gupta sold his company for nearly $20 million in 2016, but didn't feel energized or fulfilled after. Here are the practices he used to reverse burnout.

title: Apple and Arm sign deal for chip technology that goes beyond 2040
description: Apple has secured access to a core piece of intellectual property, the Arm architecture, used in its iPhone and Mac chips, for the foreseeable future.

title: U.S. announces $1 billion Ukraine aid package during surprise visit
description: Blinken's trip comes amid steady gains by Ukrainian forces carrying out a counteroffensive in the south and east of the country.

title: FTC's big swing at Amazon expected as soon as this month, reports say
description: A challenge to Amazon's alleged monopoly could result in a breakup of the more than trillion-dollar business, should the FTC file the lawsuit and win in court.

title: Khosla Ventures backs effort to build 'orchards' of 'fruit' with lung-like material to remove CO2 from the air
description: Khosla Ventures backs Spiritus, a carbon removal company coming out of stealth with a material and that passively absorbs carbon dioxide from the air.

title: Microsoft gaming chief Phil Spencer says Starfield is seeing 'huge demand'
description: Microsoft's Phil Spencer told CNBC on Wednesday that the new Starfield game is going to be available to "hundreds of millions of people."

title: Roku stock jumps after company says it will lay off 10% of workforce
description: Roku said in a regulatory filing Wednesday that it will be laying off 10% of its workforce, or 360 people, as it raised its guidance for the third quarter.

title: Disney's wildest ride: Iger, Chapek and the making of an epic succession mess
description: Here's the inside story of the executive chaos at Disney over the past few years — and how it could shape the fate of the iconic entertainment company.

title: Trump uses Facebook to fund presidential run, two years after Meta banned him
description: Donald Trump's return to Facebook has helped his campaign to raise a ton of money throughout his legal struggles, including since his arrest in Georgia.

title: WeWork CEO says company is 'here to stay' as it renegotiates 'nearly all our leases'
description: Embattled office-sharing company WeWork is starting an effort to renegotiate leases across the globe as it tries to stay solvent.

title: Trump suffers big loss in E. Jean Carroll defamation case, judge says he's liable
Qualcomm CEO says AI may breathe new life into smartphones: 'It could create a new upgrade cycle'
description: The CEO of U.S. chip giant Qualcomm thinks artificial intelligence could give the smartphone market a fresh lease on life.

title: It's official. UN says the world just endured its hottest summer on record
description: "We can still avoid the worst of climate chaos – and we don't have a moment to lose," said UN Secretary-General António Guterres.

title: Moderna says updated Covid vaccine was effective against highly mutated BA.2.86 variant in trial
description: Moderna, Pfizer and Novavax are slated to roll out new vaccines targeting XBB.1.5 within weeks, pending approvals from the FDA.

title: EU lists Alphabet, Amazon, Meta and three other tech giants as 'gatekeepers' under strict competition rules
description: The European Union on Tuesday unveiled a list of six designated "gatekeepers" set to come under its new Digital Markets Act.

title: Apple buying Disney would be a storybook ending for Iger, but fairy tales aren't real
description: Disney CEO Bob Iger may want to eventually sell Disney to Apple, but it's unclear if Apple wants to buy Disney.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Rising oil prices inflame inflation fears
description: With Saudi Arabia and Russia’s oil supply cuts, there’s a danger that the previous months of low inflation might be an outlier.

title: Evergrande soars over 70% leading Chinese property stocks higher after Country Garden avoids default
description: The real estate sector was the top gainer on the HSI, but the overall index was still in negative territory, dragged by health-care and industrial stocks.

title: There are just six bitcoin billionaires in the world, new crypto super-rich report says
description: Hundreds of millions of people have crypto investments, but only few of them have holdings worth more than $1 million, a new survey shows.

title: Chinese EVs are now seen posing a 'real threat' to Europe's auto industry
description: Chinese electric vehicles pose "a real threat" to the European car industry, but the continent's automakers are aware of the competition.

title: Google VP shares the No. 1 thing she looks for in job interviews: ‘This is a critical trait’
description: "I'm looking for people who want to exchange ideas, who want to innovate and are not happy with the status quo," said Google Asia Pacific's Sapna Chadha.

title: India importing Russian oil is a ‘win-win’ for the world economy, says India’s No. 1 oil company
description: India's imports of Russian crude is a win-win for the global economy, said Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd (ONGC), India's No. 1 oil company.

title: Tesla rival Polestar plans own smartphone launch alongside its first electric vehicle in China
description: The move underscores the way in which electric vehicle makers launching in China like Polestar are putting technology at the heart of their offering.

title: North Korean hackers have allegedly stolen hundreds of millions in crypto to fund nuclear programs
description: North Korea-linked hackers have stolen hundreds of millions of crypto to fund the regime's nuclear weapons programs, research shows.

title: Treasury yield jump is not 'death to equities,' BofA's Savita Subramanian says
description: Savita Subramanian, BofA's head of equity and quantitative strategy, sees a bullish signal in the bond move.
